name: Rock Paper Scissors (ZachYarbrough)
description:
This is a demo that I figured I would submit. There are still plenty of bugs but the basic gameplay is there.

Player 1 = Rock

W = Jump

A= Left

D = Right

E = Shoot

Player 2 = Paper

Up Arrow = Jump

Left Arrow= Left

Right Arrow = Right

Right Shift = Shoot

Player 3 = Scissors

I= Jump

J= Left

L = Right

O = Shoot

ESC = Pause Menu

Yes I know the AI is horrible, but I just added them in so people can test it out single player. The game is intended to be played locally by three people.
